case.state: My name's Dust. I'm a swordsman from the land of Falana.
I'm Dust, and these are my companions Fidget and the Blade of Ahrah.
Hmm. A game of cards? Not my usual quest, but okay.

{fidget}Hey look, another member of your stupid hat club!{!reset}
Fidget, shh.
{fidget}Hey Dust? You're no longer the leader of the Stupid Hat Club.
Is that a butterfly? A talking butterfly?
Well, at least I'm not the only one feeling a little awkward here.
{fidget}Whoa! Look at that wild hair!
Um, aren't you a little young to play a game like this?

{fidget}Ugh. Talk about a slimy jerk.{!reset}
Fidget, no.
Huh? A masked player?
Something doesn't seem right about that woman with the guns.
Hmm? What's up with all the jewlery?
Wow, what grace!
{mono}If you see this line, please file a bug report.
Uh, were her arms just...
Whose giant machine is parked right in front of the door?
Brr... This is colder than the Blackmoor Mountains...
Strip poker in public? Who chose this location?
I better win so I don't show off to all these people.
Shouldn't we be wearing swimsuits?
Shouldn't we be wearing swimsuits?
Wait, weren't we supposed to undress before entering here?
~player~, are you sure no one will find out about what we're doing here?
Does anyone else think ~opponent~ looks a little shifty?
{fidget}I don't like ~opponent~'s face.{!reset}
Uh... did I stumble into the wrong room?
A game of strip-poker, huh? This is gonna be interesting
Strip poker...? Well, it's an interesting way to relax after all I've been through.
Thanks for inviting me, ~player~.

{ahrah}Dust, are you sure you know what you're getting into?{!reset}
I can't back out now, Ahrah.
Just one card, please.
I'm just going to change one card.
I'm keeping my hand as is, thanks.
No cards.
Hmm... No, no, I'm good, thank you.
Ugh... New hand, please.
I'll exchange them all.
That hand belongs in a fire.
Give me ~cards~. Now.
Hmm... ~cards~ cards, please...
I guess I need to exchange these ~cards~.
{fidget}Ooh! Ooh! We'll take ~cards~!{!reset}
Oh Elysium!
Oh--!
I got--!
Oh--!
I got--!
Oh--!
I got--!
Oh--!
I got--!
Oh--!
I got--!
It's over, ~opponent~!
Ehehe... I'm gonna see a lot of naked girls!
Finally.
That's more like it.
Yes! Still keeping everything on!
Well. This is a good sign.
I don't think anything's gonna come off!
Knew I was wearing the right equipment for this!

{fidget}Those are good cards, right?{!reset}
Shh. We're supposed to keep that secret.
I'm still in the game, right? I don't have to jerk off if I'm not the bottom hand?
Kinda wish I could hide behind Ahrah right now.
Well, this wouldn't be the first time I've been given a break when things are desperate.
Ugh... I could have used this hand earlier.
Looks like I'm not undressing this round.
It's the small victories like this that lead up to the big ones.
Well, this is a good surprise.
This is a good place to be in... I think.
Even where I am right now, this still feels like a great break from slaying monsters.
Sorry, but you aren't going to get me to strip that easily.
Mm, yes... I think these are good.
Looks like I'm safe for now.
I know some of you want to see this hat come off. Maybe later, but not now.
This is a good position to be in.
Sorry. Hat's staying on for now!
At least I can preserve my dignity a little while longer.
I hate to say it, but you'll have to wait a bit longer to see me naked.
I would have liked this hand a little earlier, but it's fine right now.
Hmph.
Come on, let's keep moving.
I really hope this will do.
Time to see what destiny holds.
Anyone know a place around here that sells Doenjang Jjigae?
I could really go for some Charred Galbi after this game.
{fidget}Hey, Dust? What do those little pictures mean?{!reset}
Please let me win this...
Please, someone have something worse...
Hmm... Not exactly what I expected, but I guess that's fate.
Oh no... wait... This might work.
Hm. Not the best, but certainly usable.
I can make these work. I think.
Well. Not what I wanted, but pretty good.
Hm. Could have used something slightly better.
Hmm. It's not nothing, but...
Hmm... Some deep conflict deep in my souls here about this...

You better be lucky I'm holding back...
{ahrah}Dust, calm down.{!reset}
Someone's not being honest here!
I'm going to have to undress more, aren't I?
And this is where I lose my pants.
I uh... Oh Overseers...
I'd rather take on Baron Kane's ghost again than show this hand.
Someone's got to have something worse, right? ...right?
Well, ashes to ashes...
{ahrah}Be gracious in defeat, Dust...{!reset}
Ugh... Headed for defeat.
I'm not really good at this game. Normally when I play cards, it's Go Fish with Fidget.
Uh... This doesn't look good for me.
That probably wasn't good.
Shoot. That wasn't what I needed.
Oh, come on, again?
Uh, can I draw again?
Folding's not an option, is it?
Just my rotten luck.
Is there some sort of spirit making me unlucky?
Jin, Cassius... I really wish one of you had been good at cards...

Something's telling me to stick to being a warrior.
{fidget}It's me, Dust. I'm telling you that.
Uh... how more embarrassing does this have to get?
Damn!
Aaand that's not what I wanted.
Well... that's... oh.
I'm just wondering what I did to deserve this hand.

{fidget}Bingo!{!reset}
Fidget, that's not how it works.
Somehow, this is more painful than being smacked around by Trolks.
So, no mulligans, right?
...crud.
This is... a real difficult battle.
I would love to just forget that this ever happened.
I'm sure I'll find this funny sometime later, but...
{ahrah}My four "siblings" and I were forged centuries ago by some of the most talented Moonblood smiths.
{ahrah}Their names are lost to history, but they were the most talented Moonblood smiths and mages Falana had ever known.
{fidget}I'm a nimbat, silly!
{fidget}I'm a nimbat, one of the best animals out there!
Oh, what's this sword, you said, ~player~? Ahrah here's my sword... that can float... and talk. You get used to it after a while.
{ahrah}I feel an introduction is in order. I am the Blade of Ahrah, one of the five Swords of Elysium.{!reset}
Oh, ~player~, You want to know who Fidget here is? She's technically the guardian of my sword, but she's kind of become my traveling companion.

{fidget}Hey, aren't you gonna introduce me?{!reset}
I was going to get to that. That's Fidget. She's my sidekick.
Meia, Jura... you two work together, but your outfits are wildly different. Why's that?
Hmm. Meia, if you're Jura's commander, why is she dressed a bit flashier?
Don't look at me. ~player~ chose the place.
If they were intelligent enough to beg for mercy, shouldn't you have at least given some pause?
Aw, when they said Haley was gonna be here, I was thinking someone else...
Oh, you're not that Haley. Shouldn't have brought those blueprints then.
Oh, you're not that Haley. Guess I'll have to get that augment forged another time.
Oh, you're not that Haley. Guess I'll have to get that ring forged another time.
Oh, you're not that Haley. Guess I'll have to get that armor forged another time.
Oh, you're not that Haley. Guess I'll have to get that pendant forged another time.
Do you have any Hot Cocoa?
Oh man... Since I kind of fufilled my destined purpose, I have no idea what to do next.
So wait, those wings are real then?
Hey, wait a minute. That's against the rules.
Hey, what gives?!
That's not fair, and you know it!

{fidget}M-m-monster!{!reset}
{ahrah}Calm yourself. This is not a zombie that can do us harm.

A... zombie?
{ahrah}I feel no malice from Saki. You are safe, Dust.
Artificial... intelligence? Like a... um... thinking machine?
{ahrah}Chihiro must be a powerful mage indeed, to imbue sentience in the inanimate.{!reset}
Oh, forgive me, I've just never seen a talking... book?... like you before.
Oh, I'm sorry. It's just that I've never seen a book that can talk. Um, are you a book?
I'm sorry, you're just so new to me. Are you a talking book?
{fidget}You know, Dust, it almost sounds like Saki's telling us to go somewhere.
So... you're awfully bold. And is Panty your real name?
"Panty?" Is that a real name? It's the most unusual one I've come across.
You'd never meet anyone named "Panty" in Falana.
{fidget}Someone's especially eager.
If I didn't know better, I would say you were playing to lose...
You haven't seen how fast I am with an Aerial Dust Storm, have you?
What's a Texas?
So... I have to admit, I've never seen so many Warmbloods with so little fur.
I never knew furless Warmbloods were possible.
So ~player~, did your fur fall out or were you just never born with it?

{fidget}Hey Dust, why is ~player~ missing their fur?{!reset}
I have no idea, Fidget...
Um, Elesa, was it? That's a rather... interesting outfit.
I don't think I've ever seen an outfit like Elesa's at all back in Falana.
I'm guessing you dress for looks, rather than function, Elesa?
Isn't that a bit inappropriate right now?
The Blade of Ahrah is one of the Five Blades of Elysium, which means they can talk, float around on its own, and it chooses their bearer -- which is me.
Ahrah is a floating, talking sword, and I'm their fated bearer. Also, by being their bearer, they grant me amazing skills of swordsmanship.
To be honest, most people in Falana dress simply. It's only near the capital where you see more detailed clothing.
{fidget}There was that outfit that dead demon guy wore in the Sorrowing Meadows.
So Lucina, what kind of a sword do you have there?
That's a nice sword you have there, Lucina.
It's always nice to meet another sword bearer.
Um... Revy? Can you stop waving your guns around so much?
I don't want to use Ahrah to Dust Storm bullets away. Please don't point those guns around like that.
Revy, please put the guns down...
Revy, there's no monsters around. Can you put down the guns, please?

{fidget}Drunk people are funny.{!reset}
Not nice, Fidget.
I'm not really sure you should get drunk right now. It'll cloud your judgement.
Who is this flying thing anyway? Sounds a little bit like Fidget...
Can you maybe stop yelling so much, Guzma? We're all right here.
You don't need to yell, Guzma.
Guzma, is there a reason you're yelling so much?
Uh... Chazz, was it? Your hair looks like it could stab someone.

{fidget}Look at how spiky that guy's hair is.
{!reset}It's certainly... stiff as well.
Wow, I've never seen hair that's so... unmoving.
{fidget}More humiliating than when Dust got covered in mud after that fight with Lady Tethys?
{fidget}More humiliating than when Dust tried to get Haley's mute brother to talk?
Oh! A fellow Warmblood! Where are you from?
So, N, is there a reason behind your unusual name?
N, huh? I've never heard of anyone whose name was just a single letter long...
So you're a champion, Cynthia? What kind of combat do you do?
Anyone else think Megumin sounds a little unhinged?
Kazuma, are you sure you've gone on adventures?
Kazuma, something about you screams "total novice."
Aren't you a little old to be playing pretend adventurer, Kazuma?
You don't seem the adventurer sort, Kazuma.
Huh, you're in your kingdom's military? I think it's only been a few month since women were allowed to join the Royal Assassins.
{fidget}In a way, I kinda want to see what he looks like "dogged down" then.
Right, you don't know about my origins... I'm actually a fusion of two souls who killed each other at the same time. A royal assassin and a young villager.
{ahrah}Meia, Dust is a combination of two souls: an experienced warrior to give him strength, and a young man to give him kindness.
{fidget}Dust's a hybrid of two dead guys. Jin and... what was the scary assassin's name again?

{fidget}Oh yeah! Dust's got two dead guys' souls inside him. Jin's the one who died a virgin.
{!reset}We're going to have to have that conversation about tact again, Fidget.
{fidget}Ooh. She's got good taste.
I'm not sure if he'd want to see visitors right now. We just defeated a mad general who wanted to wipe out his kind.
To be honest, I'm not sure he or the other Moonbloods would want to see visitors from another world so soon after fighting for their own existence.
Maybe wait a while. We just prevented his race from being completely destroyed by a mad general.
Er... Him and his entire race were almost the victims of genocide, and you want to talk to him about using souls for power?
...Several times.
...I have killed before.
...Oh, the stories I could tell about killing.
"Akko," was it? Fidget actually knows a small bit of magic. Don't know if you two would get along though.
Three swords sounds like overkill. I'm happy with just using one, and I think Ahrah would get jealous if I did get another sword.
You're sounding awfully like Fidget right now.
Well, there are a few traditional drinking songs from Aurora Village.
I just prefer the simple stuff, to be honest.
You don't seem like you're the kind to be very unlucky, Misty.
Well, Ahrah's not much of a conversationalist, but they... Oh! Oh, you meant...
I don't know... Fidget said it's her job to keep Ahrah in her sights at all... Oh! Now I get what you mean...
Uh... what brought that topic about, exactly?
Um, well, I'm kind a living one. I don't know if you've heard of the Moonblood legend of Sen-Mithrarin?
There's mystical ruins all around Falana. Teleporters, Save Monuments, old treasure chests and statues...
Well, I've recently traveled through Falana to stop a mad general who ran a genocidal campaign.
{fidget}Well, there go your chances of impressing Haley with those plans.
{fidget}Yahtzee? No, I think that's the game with the fake money.
Well, there was that time where I fought some Giants outside Aurora Village.
{fidget}Wait, a net for cabbage? What, do they swim?
{ahrah}Are you hiding something, Guzma?
Well, um... my hat is really good at keeping the rain and sun off my face.
{fidget}The Royal Assassins can use their hats to go invisible. Dust's hat can't do that, even though, you know, it's the same kinda hat.
Well, I'm just the end product. You'd have to ask Elder Grey-Eyes, he's more of an expert on this.
Well, the souls are an integral part of me, but my mind and my body are my own.
It's very old magic, and I think what created me was the first time it was used in 200 years -- at least in Falana.
Elder Grey-Eyes would know more, honestly - he "made" me out of those two souls.
To be honest, I wouldn't know anything about your ship's core. It sounds like it's beyond Falana's current technology level.
It gets a little more confusing when you know that my mind and body have become my own. I'm neither Jin nor Cassius -- just Dust.
I don't entirely understand, myself. Elder Grey-Eyes would know more, to be honest.
Elder Grey-Eyes would know better... I'm just the end product of his magic.
I'm not entirely sure of how that works. Maybe Elder Grey-Eyes knows? He "made" me, after all.
Umm... yeah. I don't really know. Elder Grey-Eyes did the fusion, so he would?
Honestly, what you're capable of right now seems centuries ahead of what Falana's capable of.
Would you really want to know about the Way of the Flameless Light? You seem like you're centuries more advanced than Falana's best and brightest.
You'd probably cause mass panic if you appeared in Falana. Your technology is way beyond ours.
I'm not entirely sure... I think even the best mages in Falana are centuries behind what you're capable of.

{fidget}How are we gonna be sure you guys aren't gonna invade and turn us all into your zombie slaves?{!reset}
Fidget, calm down!

{fidget}Oh yeah right! You're probably asking Dust all these questions so you can turn us into zombie slaves!{!reset}
Fidget, you're over-reacting...
Hopefully, the war's over by now. There's still cleanup to be done, but maybe in a few months Falana will be at peace.
The tail end of the war, hopefully. General Gaius... he's dead, but just before he joined the Life Thread he realized the error of his ways. Maybe in a few months you can visit.
Gaius died, and hopefully, the civil war with him. We might have to deal with some more Royal Assassins and the rest of his army, but I don't think that will take long.
The war... I think might be over in a few months. Hopefully.
A... Laser Ring? I've never heard of that. What stat changes does it offer?
A Laser Ring? That... that boosts Attack, right?
Do you know where I can find a blueprint for a Laser Ring? I know a blacksmith who'd be interested.
Am I hearing this right? You two don't have men at all in your country?
Wait, you two... no men at all where you're from?
Guns are really rare in Falana... I think I only know of one person who uses them.
I have a question about those guns, ~target~... How easy is it to get a thousand-hit combo with those?
I don't think I could ever use a gun. Those things are... too loud to me. Plus Ahrah would be offended.
So, are guns common where you come from, ~target~?
Looks like it's either you or me, ~opponent~. Good thing it's not a sword fight, right?
All coming down to this...
Best of luck, ~opponent~!
~opponent~, know this... Your time is up.
It ends here, ~opponent~.
I always enjoy a good duel.
Know this, ~opponent~: I do not intend to lose.

{fidget}I was wondering, could a Hot Dog be considered a sandwich, because--{!reset}
{ahrah}Don't distract him, Fidget.{!reset}
I'm glad to know there are others around who like to travel.
So ~tgt~, where have you been recently on your travels?
One of Cassius's fellow Assassins didn't really like to use his sword much. He said use lead to "wear, tear, and rust."
I must be better at this game than I thought...
{fidget}Wow, what dumb luck, Dust.
{ahrah}Impressive, Dust.
And Ginger said I was bad at playing games of chance.
Is it weird that I'm getting used to everyone being naked here?
Wow. You'd never see a gathering like this in Falana.
If we were playing this in Aurora Village, Calum would have hauled us all off to jail by now.
Is it weird that I'm getting used to being like this?
If I was naked this long in Aurora Village, Calum would have put me in jail by now.
Sorry. I get these mood swings sometimes.
Er... I can't really explain these mood swings.

{ahrah}Temper yourself, Dust...{!reset}
Oh yeah, sorry.

Hm? Who's Haley? Oh, she's a blacksmith back in Falana.
{fidget}Who Dust totally has a secret crush on.{!reset}
This had better be worth it.
{fidget}Hey, I'm kinda curious. What kind of snacks are you guys' favorites?
{fidget}Hey, who else here thinks Dust's hat is a little stupid-looking?
{fidget}This one's kind of important to me. If you had to beat up your best friend to bring them back to their senses, would you?
{fidget}This is kind of a serious question. What would you do if your best friend had doubts because of something they weren't able to do?
Hey, ~leader~, what kind of Luck-boosting equipment do you have on?
Wow, ~leader~, you've got a good streak going.
{ahrah}~leader~ is certainly doing well for themselves.
{fidget}How is ~leader~ so good at this? Do they have hidden cards somewhere?
THAT DOES IT!

Genetic... facility?
{ahrah}While my Master is a hybrid of sorts, he is not exactly what you have described.{!reset}
That's how everything is in Falana... both men and women are either Warmbloods like me, or Moonbloods...
Your people know of Warmbloods? Do they know about Moonbloods too?
Meia, quit looking at me like that! It's bad enough I have to get naked!
Jura, quit looking at me like that! It's bad enough I have to get naked!
Just what rumors have been going around about me?
I wish I had never heard that question.
Yeah... dealing with "that..." No. Just no.
You're sounding awfully like Fidget right now.
Why do you keep asking these STUPID questions?!
If I can, I would rather not fight the defenseless...
Why do you keep asking these STUPID questions?!
Um, could you not tell us how creepy "chat" is?
This is the weirdest interview I've ever been involved in.
Just what rumors have been going around about me?
I wish I had never heard that question.
Yeah... dealing with "that..." No. Just no.
"Human?" Is that the name for you furless Warmbloods? And no, I guess not.
Ohhh... not exactly. I live in a little place called Aurora Village.
Uh, I'm not exactly a forest dweller. I'm planning on settling down in Aurora Village.
Hm? A forest spirit? I'm just a normal Warmblood.
Oh, nothing like that, I'm just a wolf Warmblood.
Um, Jura? Why are you staring at me?
Jura, can you stop staring at me so much?
Um, Meia? Why are you staring at me?
Meia, can you stop staring at me so much?
I'm guessing "Mink" is your word for Warmblood?

All right, Fidget, I'll "bite" him, but only to prove it won't curse him.
{ahrah}Dust, you can't be serious. Don't do it.
This. Isn't. Funny, ~cheater~.
I will NOT stand for this, ~cheater~.
~cheater~! Play with honor or leave!
I know you're behind this, ~cheater~!
~cheater~! I know you're to blame for this!
Come on, twice in a row?
Again?
This... ISN'T... funny.
Someone WILL pay for this.
I thought a pair would work..
A pair wasn't enough this time...
What kind of rigged game is this?!
This is ridiculous. What kind of game is this?
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
I will NOT tolerate this failure.
I lost with TWO PAIR?
What kind of rigged game is this?!
This is ridiculous. What kind of game is this?
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
I will NOT tolerate this failure.
I lost with THREE OF A KIND?!
What kind of rigged game is this?!
This is ridiculous. What kind of game is this?
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
I will NOT tolerate this failure.
I lost with a STRAIGHT?!
What kind of rigged game is this?!
This is ridiculous. What kind of game is this?
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
I will NOT tolerate this failure.
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
~cheater~! Play with honor or leave!
Uh oh...
Oops... uh...
Oh my.
This is embarrassing.
I know you're behind this, ~cheater~!
~cheater~! I know you're to blame for this!
Er, I'm just curious... How long am I allowed to keep my hat on?
Well. I guess I had to lose sometime.
And there goes the perfect game.
Hm. Didn't really expect to lose this hand.
And my lead falls a little more.
There goes that run of good luck.
Hm. I didn't want to give up this lead.
So that's it, huh? We're all going to be naked now.
Who knew that my underwear was the last piece of clothing to go in the game?
Now the real tense moments of the game begin.
This is ridiculous. What kind of game is this?
This. Isn't. Funny.
I will NOT stand for this.
Absurd... This is absurd.
I can't believe I even came to this game.
I will NOT tolerate this failure.
Uh oh...
Oops... uh...
Oh my.
This is embarrassing.
Oh no... Oh no...
This is going to be horrible.
Did Kane curse me? Am I cursed with bad luck?
Oh, no no no...
{fidget}All right, everyone, here it comes! The Dick of the Sen-Mithrarin!
And this is it, my last shred of dignity, gone...

And this is it, my last shred of dignity, gone... {fidget}
I think you lost it like two hands ago, actually...
Oh crap. Everyone's staring at me.
Do I have to undress again? Oh no.
Hey, wait! I...
Oh, Hounds' Teeth and Trolk Fingers...
Son of a Beast...
Oh, Blomb it...
{ahrah}This is one of those times I wonder if I picked the wrong person to be my Bearer.
{ahrah}(Sigh)Master, please...
{ahrah}Dust, have you LOST YOUR MIND?!
{ahrah}Really, Dust? Biting THERE of all places?!
{ahrah}Dust, you are Sen-Mithrarin, not some common Trolk! Stop that!
{ahrah}By the Overseers, Dust, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
{ahrah}Dust! Even if Chazz is an annoyance, LEAVE HIS BEHIND ALONE!
Where I'm from? It's a nation called Falana. I don't really have a hometown there.
Oh, Ahrah? They're a mystical ancient blade that chose me to bear them. Pretty simple.
{ahrah}I am the Blade of Ahrah, one of the five Swords of Elysium. Dust is my fated bearer. However, Meia, he does not meet your definition of "Esper."
{fidget}Oh, the sword's just one I had to keep watch over, then they decided to wake up and head over to Dust here. It's kinda special.

{fidget}Telekinesis? Is that one of Dust's powers?
{ahrah}It is not, Fidget.
You'd be amazed what a good cloak can do for you when you travel all over the place.
... I like this hat.
Oh. I get that a lot, actually. I can see just fine with it on.
Hmm?
I don't know what that word means, but it sounds uncomfortable.

{fidget}Flying rat?! I'm a NIMBAT, thank you very much. {small}
Sheesh, some people...
Well, it's a lot more peaceful now that the monster attacks have stopped.
It's fine now. There were some monster attacks, but they've stopped.
Oh, it's uh... it's those of us who have fur and hair, as opposed to the Moonbloods.
Oh yeah... uh... I think other people call us "mammals?"
Well, I've been traveling around Falana for the most part. I'd like to see more of the world someday.
This hat's just really special to me.
Can you not use such language, Cynthia? I'm embarrassed enough...
Cynthia, can you not stare so much?

{fidget}And Spike's lost it. Good job, Dust.{!reset}
It was YOUR idea...
It's a SATGAT...
{fidget}Maybe you should wear the stupid hat if you think you're gonna turn into him, Chazz.
How much of a savage do you think I am?
Why would you think I would eat people?
Wait... I have to undress now? Are those the rules?
The rest of you are going to undress when you lose, right? This isn't a prank on me?
At least we're all men here, at least we're all men here...
Can't believe all these women are going to see me...
I have to undress? I don't really like this game.

state.text:
{ahrah}You knew what you were getting into, Dust.{!reset}
Please don't make this even more embarrassing.

case.state: I can't believe I'm going to do this... not even Ahrah has seen me naked!

{fidget}Well, you're about to be naked. You owe me a cupcake.{!reset}
Later!
Oh... I'd rather be dueling Gaius again than doing this!
Sorry. I get these mood swings sometimes.
Time to lose the shoes now, I guess.
I don't think I ever took these off, as far as I can remember...
{fidget}Oh man, I hope you don't have foot odor, Dust.
I really wonder what I was thinking when I agreed to this...
Ah, before you ask -- I don't "go commando".
{fidget}Hey Dust, do you actually wear underwear?
It has to be the hat now?
I'm going to feel naked without this... um... You know what I mean!
Well, I guess my underwear has to be the last thing to go, so for now...
{fidget}Finally, the stupid hat comes off.
Well, I guess that's the rules of the game.
It's gonna be weird undressing in front of others.
